name: Relaxaurus

ability.name: Hungry Missile
ability.description: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a missile launcher while mounted.

description:
Contrary to its blas√© appearance, it's quite ferocious.
It perceives everything in its sight as prey and will stop at nothing to devour it.

skills.name: Dragon Cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: Aqua Gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Dragon Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Bubble Blast
skills.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Draconic Breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: Aqua Burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Dragon Meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
